name: elsymdifxor
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, csymdif(c1, c2)), wxo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))

stmt.origin: bitr4i(wcel(c0, csymdif(c1, c2)), wxo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wn(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))))

comment: Membership in a symmetric difference is an exclusive-or relationship. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 26-Apr-2020.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 13-Aug-2022.)
